actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A Resolution expressing the disapproval of the Senate with respect to the action of the President of the United States sending notice of termination of the Mutual Defense Treaty with the Republic of China without prior consultation with the Senate.

summary.text: Expresses Senate disapproval of the termination of the Mutual Defense Treaty with the Republic of China by the President without prior consultation with the Senate.

titles.title: A Resolution expressing the disapproval of the Senate with respect to the action of the President of the United States sending notice of termination of the Mutual Defense Treaty with the Republic of China without prior consultation with the Senate.
